duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate the Organization's financial management of grants and specific federal contracts in a dynamic, collaborative, and mission-based environment.
Develop and review budgets for grant proposals aligned with organizational priorities and available expense categories.
Support grant writer(s) in responding to and managing follow-up financial requests from funders.
Track adjustments and projections, and allocate expenses to specific funders according to budget and need.
Provide timely and accurate financial reports for donors to meet rolling deadlines across all funding relationships.
Review incoming grant agreements for their financial requirements and ensure compliance with funders' terms and conditions.
Maintain documentation of financial documents for funding agreements and strong internal processes which intersect with the Development Team.
Identify and prepare a periodic and annual restricted revenue release schedule, and assist in grant expenses decision-making.
Perform administrative tasks (information management, maintenance of financial aspects of grant files, document destruction, etc.) as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent, plus four years of related experience
